lines.text: I DON'T WANT TO GO, I WANT TO STAY!
And do what?
FINISH HIGH SCHOOL!
GREAT START! What's your major, Town Tramp?
NO, MOM! THE TOWN ALREADY HAS ONE!
[Rachel slaps her]
Charlotte, I know you're planning a celibate life, but with half my chromosomes, I think that might be tough.
[Charlotte is praying at a shrine she has made in her room to the Virgin Mary]
Charlotte, we're Jewish.

[to Charlotte as she goes out to spend time with Joe]
Don't do anything I wouldn't do...
[pause]
Or don't do anything I would!
Oh god. I think I might be pregnant with the next Jewish Italian Messiah
Sometimes I feel like you're the child and I'm the grown up.
Alright, you know what? I'll make you a deal. You stop being a little bitch for, let's say, oh, I don't know, an hour or two, and I won't knock the religion of your choice for a week. Deal?
Deal!
Who's that?
That's Mr. Crane, my history teacher, and he is very nice.
*He* is an asshole.
You haven't even spoken to him yet!
Charlotte, I don't need to speak to him. He's driving an Edsel, for Christ's sake.
Oh, I'm going to hell for sure. Here he is, talking about his poor dead mother and I can't help wishing his hands were unbuttoning my dress!
Please God don't let me fall in love and want to do disgusting things... Dear God, I love the way he throws.

[Charlotte thinks she is pregnant because she kissed Joe]
Has your mother ever talked to you about sex?
Uh... oh yeah! All the time. We talk about everything. She's a wonderful mother.
So you do know how babies are made?
Oh, yeah.
Then why did you think you were pregnant? You're still a virgin.
See that woman right there? That's my mother and when I grow up... I want to be just like yours.
Mary, you already are.

[Reacting to an odd smile from Rachel as they lay in bed together]
What?
You're a sexy guy.
Do you have to sound surprised when you say that?
I *am* surprised.
Ok, I've had a little scotch... I'm real calm.

[while being dressed up like her mother]
Care to dance, Mrs. Flax?
If you care about us, would it kill you to show it?
"Us"? When did YOU and *my* children become "us"? You're just YOU, Lou - me and the girls, THAT'S "us"!
I was talking about you and me.
I wanted to ask her what color her bra was and if she had pure thoughts every second of the day, but...
He can't be relied on.
Okay mom, if you want to drive Lou away, that's your buisness. If you want Joe, it's war.
So Joe, tell me about the nuns in the convent. Do they wear underwear in the shower?
I'm going to make real sandwiches; big ones that a man can sink his teeth into.
the word is "hors d'oeurves." Fun Finger Foods is her main source book and it's all the woman cooks.
He has the most beautiful skin in captivity, I love him because he wears moccasins in the winter even though his feet must feel like blocks of ice.
Death is dwelling on the past or staying in one place too long!
